description: Tomato&nbsp;Spritz is a new drink that might be good for your skin! Made with tomato juice this refreshing cocktail has an added health benefit. Lycopene, the antioxidant found in tomatoes, improves skin integrity and can provide some protection from damaging UV rays. It's time to mix up a Tomato Spritz or two!
name: Tomato Spritz
recipeIngredient: Cherry tomato and parsley stalk for garnish
